amendment.description: An amendment numbered 129 printed in the Congressional Record to add additional limitations to the plan.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add additional limitations to the plan including to prevent any new oil and gas production if those activites would result in a negative effect on air quality.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 232 (Roll no. 59).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Cohen.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 232 (Roll no. 59).
